[console_scripts]
notion-oauth-handler = notion_oauth_handler.scripts.cli:run

[notion_oauth_handler.auth_view]
debug = notion_oauth_handler.server.view:DebugNotionOAuthRedirectView
default = notion_oauth_handler.server.view:DefaultNotionOAuthRedirectView
echo = notion_oauth_handler.server.view:EchoNotionOAuthRedirectView

[notion_oauth_handler.consumer]
dummy = notion_oauth_handler.core.consumer:DummyNotionOAuthConsumer
